    Removes Actor and creates a Corpse

    Perform the Action.
    java.lang.String EatFromGrowableAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Heals an actor based on amount of fruits eaten, and decrement fruit count of growable for total times actor ate from it
    java.lang.String EatItemAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Heals actor based on item's heal points and removes item from map if it is fully eaten.
    java.lang.String EatPreyAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Attacks an actor and heals by its damage dealt
    java.lang.String FeedAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Heals target based on healing of item and removes the item from player inventory
    java.lang.String LayEggAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Creates an Egg of that Dinosaur type and removes PREGNANT enum from Dinosaur
    java.lang.String PickFruitAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Adds one Fruit into Player's inventory and decrement fruit count of growable if Player succeeds
    java.lang.String QuitGameAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Performs the quit game action.
